items.title: Trump administration ends temporary protected status for thousands of Afghans
items.description: As soon as May 20, thousands of Afghans living in the U.S. will lose a protection that shielded them from deportation and allowed them to work.

items.title: Trump says he took a cognitive test as part of his latest physical
items.description: President Trump had his first physical of his second term on Friday at Walter Reed National Military Medical Center.

items.title: Dozens of USAID contracts were canceled last weekend. Here's what happened
items.description: The rationale was to address "mismanagement, fraud, and misaligned priorities." Former USAID official Jeremy Konyndyk said reversals and inconsistence...

items.title: How Trump's immigration policy changes who gets arrested and detained
items.description: During his second Presidential campaign, Donald Trump vowed to carry out the largest deportation program the U.S. has ever seen. And true to his word ...

items.title: 'I cannot guarantee complete confidentiality,' VA therapists ordered to tell veterans
items.description: Mental health therapists at Veterans Affairs should begin sessions with patients saying they are in a shared office space, a memo obtained by NPR says...
